title: sharavaNabavaanandha
sahitya:
sharavaNabhavAnanda svAmi SaNmukhA nIdu 

caraNamula cUparAdA



anupallavi



 parama pAvana nija bhaktArtti haraNA tripurahara sulOcanOtbhavA ninnu vEDitE



caraNam



 cirakAlamugA nIdu sEvAdulamani maraciyuNDina nannu mannincu mA taNDri

 taruNI vallIlOlA shankari vara bAlA harikEshapura lIlayani sadA vEDitE
